name: Event Horizon (itch) (Jake Ward)
description:
Event Horizon is a simple infinite side-scrolling space game where the player must dodge black holes and missiles to make it as far as possible.

There are also a couple of simple physics-based puzzles in the challenges mode.

This is an early prototype and may or may not be expanded upon in the future.

Controls:
WASD/arrow keys - apply thrust in direction
Mouse left button - apply thrust towards mouse position
